Html:
Hi,

Is there a way to use custom enum types in the CSD?

If there is no direct way, does someone have a "best practice" for doing it?

Thanks

It's possible, you can define a custom enum type in the Configuration Section Explorer tool window (see "Defining Types" on the homepage).

Cheers,

Jelle

Thanks,

I scanned that page a little too quickly :)

-A
